org.openhubframework.openhub.core.conf

Class ConfigurationChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.conf.ConfigurationChecker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<org.springframework.context.event.ContextRefreshedEvent>

    public class ConfigurationChecker
extends Object
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<org.springframework.context.event.ContextRefreshedEvent>
    Configuration checker that is called when application context is initialized. There are some predefined checks or you can define your own checking via ConfCheck interface.

    Checking of localhost URI must be explicitly enabled by calling setCheckUrl(boolean) because there were few problems on some platforms during testing.

    Initialized this listener in child "Spring WS" application context.

    Since:
    0.4
    Author:
    Petr Juza
    See Also:
    CheckingConfMessageDispatcherServlet, ConfCheck
